website_summaries.verdict: A popular and inexpensive choice. This pitcher looks really good, but isn't the most durable.
pros: It's got a 100% clear finish, so it looks really good
It's bigger than most pitchers and the body and handle are thick, so it's easy to hold and pour without making a mess
cons: It's not dishwasher safe so you'll have to wash it by hand
Most users notice early signs of wear after moderate use

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea, low quality.
customer_reviews.text: This item didn't last 6 months. Spider cracks on the lid prompted an exchange after several days, the replacement did the exact same thing within weeks. Cracks then appeared around the rim and later at the bottom causing the pitcher to leak. This item was only cleaned by hand and never put in the dishwasher or handled in any adverse way. Infusing is a fabulous process for flavoring all kinds' of liquids, unfortunately this item isn't the pitcher to do it with.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie D

customer_reviews.title: 4+ Years Later = Still Love It
customer_reviews.text: Love this pitcher! Bought it in June 2013 & I still use it on a weekly basis to make “Sassy Water” (google it, it’s amazing!) which is basically a staple in my fridge. The filter slots are perfect for keeping the lemon seeds from floating out & since the lid also has slots, I love to throw extra cucumber in the pitcher to float freely & don’t have to worry about it pouring into my glass 👌🏽 Holding up great, no tiny cracks in the pitcher, that tend to happen over time. Still looks exactly the same from the 1st day I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Sovay

customer_reviews.title: Handle is Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pitcher in April 2016 and loved using it but very quickly the handle of the pitcher literally broke off. But, I thought, maybe I was just unlucky, so I bought another one in February 2017. Today the handle came off the second pitcher. I loved serving lemon-infused water to my guests with this pitcher. I loved that it was lightweight and so much easier to handle than a glass one. I loved that it was clear so the luscious fruit was clearly visible. But, alas, the handle is just unreliable. Too bad, but I won't buy another.
customer_reviews.author: C. Korbel

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! Especially perfect for the summer!
customer_reviews.text: I had to have one of these after I went on a Disney Cruise and they had a lot of infused water in their spa. I was not disappointed with my purchase! This makes water so refreshing! It’s a great way to get some flavor in the water without adding tons of calories and sugars. Best purchase! I even got my mother in law one for mother’s day and she loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pitcher!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my pitcher today! I'm super excited. First, it came in great condition. No issues, no sharp edges, nothing broken. It appears to be sturdy. Looks nice as well. Second, I washed it immediately, and let it dry. Third, I filled up the pitcher with purified water. Added some blackberries and raspberries. I left it in the fridge for about 5 hours. I did not taste the flavor, so we figured maybe I should cut the berries. I didn't cut them the first time because I figured I didn't need to. I'll try the water tomorrow morning. **fingers crossed**
customer_reviews.author: LAM

customer_reviews.title: MOLD! UPDATE!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd pitcher I have had since January and this one is no longer unusable due to also developing mold on the lid. There is not a sufficient seal where the parts come together and mold is inevitable - this is the 2nd one I have purchased in 8 months and I just missed the window of opportunity to contact seller. Seller, find a non toxic sealant and eliminate this problem - otherwise I love it. Cannot recommend to others with this persistent problem. Please contact me if you want to replace this item. Great customer Service! They sent me 2 new replacement lids! Hopefully no further issues!
customer_reviews.author: BellaBean

customer_reviews.title: Nice flavor infusion pitcher.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using my Pro-dyne FI-3 pitcher a couple weeks. It is very easy to put the fruit/veggies in the infuser and I like that it screws into the lid. I am very careful to wash it by hand as it doesn't specifically say it is dishwasher safe. The plastic seems sturdy and the handle is comfortable. The only issue I had is when I emptied the infuser but didn't screw it back to the lid, the lid fell off when I tried to pour the water. Easy solution - keep the infuser screwed on even when empty. I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GDH

customer_reviews.title: Great Product !
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely pitcher,easy to use,clean and refill with your favorite vegetable or fruit into the middle tube, also easy to do. I make cucumber water and I make a different fruit water in several variations. This is a great way to get your water quota for the day. I wake up and the first thing I do is pour my glass of water from this lovely pitcher. I will be ordering another one for this summer . This would also make a great wedding gift it is really a great idea and any new bride would love this.
customer_reviews.author: wild wild woman

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for Mother
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my Mom as a Mother's Day gift and she loves it. She said it has gotten her to drink more water and she is having fun trying out all the different infusion combinations. It's very attractive and looks durable. I also purchased a fruit infused water recipe book to go with it. Here is the link if anyone is interested:  The two paired together made a avery nice gift. Highly recommend this pitcher!
customer_reviews.author: SpiritofATL78

customer_reviews.title: Lurking problems.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful pitcher with a lurking and dangerous problem. After using for a few months and with frequent washings, I began to notice mold growing in the lid. It was due to water getting trapped in the seal of the lid. I was appalled and tried to get it clean, however, could not. I threw the lid away and continue to use the pitcher, however, this defeats the purpose of the fruit diffuser as it must be attached to the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Sullivan Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Infusion with Style - Easy to Load and Clean - Infuses  Well
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive and stylish pitcher. Easy to take apart for loading with your desired fruits or vegetables for infusion and cleaning afterwards- Infuses the flavors fairly quickly. No problems after a few months of constant use. Favorite flavor combinations are: raspberry with a bit of lime, mango - cucumber, strawberry and cucumber with lime. Will buy another to have a choice of flavors available.
customer_reviews.author: Greg J

customer_reviews.title: Poor value.
customer_reviews.text: Used three times. Outside of the return window. Always hand washed. Pulled it out today, shattered long shard safty glass. Ok, what is $20 to you. How much use did I get out of it? Not worth it to me. Maybe I got a bad batch? We will see what the seller has to say.
customer_reviews.author: Coustom cabinet and fixture creator.

customer_reviews.title: Plus I guess I am just not good at picking the fruit for the infusion thing
customer_reviews.text: I find it tough to get fruit all the way to the bottom of the infuser part. Plus I guess I am just not good at picking the fruit for the infusion thing, but I don't really get much a fruit flavor and I find the insert piece a hassle to get the fruit out of and clean when I am done. The pitcher itself is a good size for making ice tea or lemonade though.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: What could I say?!
customer_reviews.text: My family loves it! We love the nice smooth handle. The size is a perfect fit for the space in our refrigerator. It’s as tall as a gallon of milk. I suggest getting a scrubber brush with soft brittles to clean inside of the tube that the fruit goes in. Removing the top does make me nervous when the tube is inside because I don’t want to break it but that may be just how I feel. Anywho, but it, you’ll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good infusion pitcher for the $$
customer_reviews.text: this is a good pitcher, I like the fact that it is plastic and glass because it is makes the pitcher lighter in weight. The center that hold the fruit could be a bit bigger. It is narrow and strawberries don't really fit that well. Otherwise, it is a good pitcher and serves it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve had this pitcher for about 10 months, here is my review. It doesn’t stain even if you leave blueberries and other berries in the pitcher for weeks at a time. The top will get spider web cracks in it if you push down on the top to seal it. Works as intended. We use it for Sangria and fruit infused water it works marvelously. I just wish there was a hole at the very bottom of the infuser so all the water can drain out
customer_reviews.author: Tsurani

customer_reviews.title: Handle fell off after little use
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for 2 years and have used it sparingly (just during summer sangria season). Today I picked it up to use it and the handle just fell off. It looks like stress fractures at both ends of the handle caused the problem. Considering how little I've used it and not overfilled it with heavy fruit, I can't believe it fell apart so quickly. Cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RRM

customer_reviews.title: I love these infusion pitchers!  So many possibilities!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pitcher. I ended up purchasing a second one. They're so versatile. I've already gotten so much use infusing water with cucumbers and then cantaloupe and then peaches with cinnamon. I also brew sun tea in my sun tea jar and transfer it to my infusion pitcher and add fruit such as rasberries, blackberries, peaches, strawberries, etc. The sky is the limit with possibility. I did purchase a muddler to smash up different fruit before adding it to the infusion pitcher to get as much flavor as possible from the fruit, etc. It helps when you're combining herbs such as mint to the mixture. I love these pitchers!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a big gadget person, and hate clutter in the kitchen, but I LOVE this pitcher and use it all the time. It helps me drink more water by adding a little flavor. The only downside is that it can’t be put in the dishwasher and snapping the lid can be a challenge at times because it’s plastic. I bought one for a friend, and another for my office, so totally worth it. Actually, one of the most useful things I bought all year!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Linton

customer_reviews.title: It's too bad because I liked the resulting water
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it, it got stuck when I tried to change the fruit. My husband even tried a vise grip because, at this point if it breaks, who cares? But, it's no use. It's too bad because I liked the resulting water.
customer_reviews.author: E. DeSapio

customer_reviews.title: Little smaller than expected, but AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Great product, looks lovely and clear! Center holder attaches nicely. A little smaller than originally expected but overall good product 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Lupe

customer_reviews.title: Useful pitcher but plastic is fragile
customer_reviews.text: I love this pitcher, but twice had to get a new one because the plastic broke. With first one the lid holding the core came off and the pitcher dropped and shatteredI bought a second ine that has lasted awhile but now the core has separatd from the top and wont screw on.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Hopeful

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This has been a fun and helpful pitcher. We've tried several different fruits for different flavors and have enjoyed each one. It makes drinking water a pleasure. It's hand wash only, but it's not been difficult to clean. I think this purchase is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: SER

customer_reviews.title: Well made, badly thought out.
customer_reviews.text: OK reason for the 3 stars ( I was considering 2) The Pitcher and Flavor Infuser are actually well made and fit together easily the problem is that the opening (pour spout) is always exposed. So if you put it into refrigerator it will always be exposed. No way of closing it by turning top or otherwise. So even though the product is made well, the design of the "lid" could have taken this into account. Otherwise after a few days you will start getting "refrigerator" taste in your drink
customer_reviews.author: peterg

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We make homemade lemonade and are able to enhance the flavor by using different berries and citrus. We absolutely love this.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie54

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product for a year and it’s still in perfect condition. Not even the slightest crack and it’s in my refrigerator week after week. Also very stylish so it can an be placed on the dinner table. The diffuser can be filled with lemon slices, cucumber slices, mint leaves, lime - the possibilities are endless. I purchased this to cut down on my soda consumption. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun to use
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher is working great so far. I had a glass one before, which fell out of a cabinet and broke, but this one won't break since it's plastic. I like how it holds so much water and it makes water fun to drink since you can flavor it naturally. I like flavoring mine with cucumber and lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this pitcher. The pitcher is very sturdy, very well made. It arrived pretty quickly & well packaged. I’m able to try different fruits & combinations & so far, I’ve really loved the taste it gives my water. Great buy, definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Leticia

customer_reviews.title: Use it every day!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very easy to use and the infused water is so yummy and healthy. My teenage boys get a kick out of the recipes I try and are drinking more water. It looks so pretty with the fruit in it and is a great addition to your beverage choices when entertaining. I am using it constantly. I have found that it works best and you get the best tasting water if you put your fruit in at night and refrigerate. By the next day, your water is fully fruit infused and tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: quick cooler!!!
customer_reviews.text: this pitcher is very easy to use. Its looks good on your table. You have to use the contents right away. You cannot add ice because it will deliute the flavor of the fruit water. change fruit often to keep the flavor fresh
customer_reviews.author: grandma E

customer_reviews.title: Great pitcher!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product on the recommendation of someone on Instagram. I’m very satisfied with it. It’s easy to clean, easy to fill with fruit, herbs or whatever you like to make flavored water with. I usually drink a full pitcher everyday. This is one of my favorite things I’ve purchased .
customer_reviews.author: luckylulu

customer_reviews.title: Good way to stay hydrated if you don’t like drinking plain water.
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for a family member who is dealing with cancer treatment and had a hard time staying hydrated due to not liking the taste of plain water, she now loves infusing water with all different fruits for lots of heathy all natural flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Nice for a party
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and easy to clean. Fruit only lasts about 5 days and needs to change vs the information on here says 10 days. Flavors water nicely. We now only use this for entertaining and not so much daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Ape

customer_reviews.title: Great infusion pitcher!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so excited to have spa-quality cucumber water at home! The infuser is easy to figure out, and filling the pitcher is easy. It's a good-sized pitcher, and very attractive. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Musselman

customer_reviews.title: Raspberry Tea!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this for a week, but it’s fantastic! Very sturdy & easy to clean. I use it to infuse my tea with raspberries, & it does so perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: BM Howell

customer_reviews.title: Nice pitcher
customer_reviews.text: Nice pitcher! Easy to use and clean I came back and revised my review because after a few uses, it became difficult to use in that it was had to get the top on and off and the basket that fits in the middle became difficult to get on and off. Poor design
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L.

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was better quality
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love this pitcher! I love that you put the fruit in and it infuses with the water. The plastic seems cheap. The first one I got, the lid was all cracked and broken. i got a replacement and the lid on this one cracked after one use. Besides the cheap plastic I like it. I took it to a staff meeting on my treat day and everyone was impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory E

customer_reviews.title: Good plastic pitcher but as for infuser it's a poor product
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion this doesn't work at all no matter what fruit you put in it it doesn't really change the taste of the water, I ended up using it as just a picture without the infuser.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my birthday from a co-worker, and I absolutely love it! The first time I used a mango, orange and raspberries, plus two green tea bags. I refilled it three times before deciding to try something else. Now I have cucumber and an orange with fresh basil leaves and two lemon flavored green tea bags. Nice and fresh, especially with it heating up here in Florida. It inspires me to drink more water when I'm at home, and the taste is so nice, I don't hesitate to refill the glass over and over. Just use your imagination and find your perfect concoction!
customer_reviews.author: D. Millwood

customer_reviews.title: Nice product design but hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: The product idea is great but it is very hard to clean. We stopped using it after a few times. We noticed patches on the product after a couple of times and they won't go away.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Works well for infused water
customer_reviews.text: Addicted to lemon and lime infused water. Easy to set up. Fits in my refrigerator. I gave this also as a gift. They are using it to infuse sweet tea. Strongly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sophi

customer_reviews.title: ... have given the pitcher a 5 - I really loved it. However
customer_reviews.text: I would have given the pitcher a 5 - I really loved it. However, the lid cracked and no longer works. Very disappointing. I bought 2 others to give as gifts for Christmas. I wouldn't have purchased them had I known that mine would crack in just a few months. The pitcher was not abused. It was hand washed and never dropped or damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J

customer_reviews.title: Love this pitcher
customer_reviews.text: The water where I live is completely hard and gross so I mostly drank bottled flavored water. I haven't bought any bottles since I got this pitcher. My kids and I love coming up with flavor combinations.
customer_reviews.author: chaskagirl

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter added this pitcher to her wish list. She loved it! It's exactly as described. And she's having fun using different fruits, vegetables and herbs for flavoring.
customer_reviews.author: laguna

customer_reviews.title: My Pitcher Can Out Infuse Your Pitcher
customer_reviews.text: Again for those of you into fruit and water, ice tea and fruit combos, this is your pitcher. BPA free this number allows you to infuse whatever liquid in the pitcher with the flavor of natural fruit. The infusion rod, as it is called, is quite large, and the pitcher itself can be refilled again even when the fruit is present. Simple, yet elegant design, this pitcher will be around long after the water infusion fad has passed our lips...
customer_reviews.author: L.M.R

customer_reviews.title: and cleans up very nicely. As long as you keep the fruit covered ...
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher is now a staple in my fridge. It works very well, and cleans up very nicely. As long as you keep the fruit covered with water it lasts for about a week. I have just gotten into the habit of taking the cold water into a glass and immediately refilling the pitcher. Otherwise, the fruit can go bad fairly quickly if exposed to the air. The flat bottom infuser makes it really easy to fill, and the lid fits very nicely on the pitcher. Great with all kinds of fruits.
customer_reviews.author: SMG Pittsburgh

customer_reviews.title: Glass Like But Plastic
customer_reviews.text: For some reason when I ordered it I thought the pitcher was glass and only the infuser was plastic. The whole thing is plastic. It is okay and will probably last longer because it is plastic. If you are using it to infuse herbs/fruit in tea, I recommend brewing the tea in one pitcher and pouring it into this pitcher after it has cooled down. I tried brewing the tea and infusing with mint at the same time and it didn't taste good. I brewed the tea and then put it in the pitcher with the mint while it was warm but not hot and that was much better.
customer_reviews.author: Julie B.

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear pitcher
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! Crystal clear!! Just makes me drink lots of water!!
customer_reviews.author: Cateluta

customer_reviews.title: 2nd purchase...love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd purchase of this pitcher. The first got accidently dropped from the 3rd level in my frig, and the top lid cracked. It is clear plastic, so that couild happen, but it was sure better than glass shattering! Even though plastic, this pitcher is very nice looking...clear as can be...looks like glass. We usually just add lemons, but sometimes do berries. One's thing for sure...we drink a lot more water since owning it. Would I buy again? Well...I did!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Chalkupanother1

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I get tired of drinking just plain water and want a little splash of fun in my life so this was an excellent purchase for it! Very nice quality and it holds the fruit together in the center perfectly. Super easy to clean as I just rinse it and then run it in the dish washer. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Howatt

customer_reviews.title: Prodyne Fruit Infusion Flavor Pitcher
customer_reviews.text: The pitcher is lovely but disappointed that the fruit flavor doesn't disburse making the flavor stronger. With oranges and lemons, I have to squeeze the juice in the water than then cut up the pieces to put in the cylinder. I also determined that I like the fruit pealed rather than with the rind in the water. Other than the fact that the presentation is pretty on the table, you can put fruit in a regular pitcher and the flavor will be the same.
customer_reviews.author: DottieK

customer_reviews.title: Having fun experimenting with flavor combinations
customer_reviews.text: My sister gave me an infusion water bottle for my birthday and I wanted something bigger to keep in the fridge. My first pitcher was lemon-cucumber with basil and mint; very refreshing. The pitcher arrived in perfect condition. It has a nice heft to it that indicates the quality of the material. I'm going to try a lemon-ginger infusion next.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M. Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: Makes Good Flavored Water
customer_reviews.text: I have used all kinds of fruit and vegetables to make flavored water in this and it works beautifully. It's also pretty to look at and cleans easily.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this it’s just big enough to fit in my fridge and still leave enough room for my roommates stuff. My water is always ready and fresh. Especially, now that it’s been hot in CA
customer_reviews.author: Vilma Montalvo

customer_reviews.title: The lid does not close by design, choose one that does.
customer_reviews.text: The lid on this does not close by design, there are other similar products for the same price that the lid does close, had I known I would have bought one of those.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: So refreshing!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this pitcher for 2 years now and I love it! Sometimes the inner core is tight to unscrew but has NEVER been a problem! It looks good, the plastic has stayed crystal clear and when I use for entertaining everyone wants one! I have used every fruit imaginable and it always looks and tastes good. One person said that it discolored when they used for iced tea....I do not think this pitcher was made for anything but clear water. I highly recommend it and am going to order one for my daughter who will probably put her Fat Flush mixture into it. Cucumbers, grapefruit, mint and a few other things!
customer_reviews.author: april showers

customer_reviews.title: Cucumber Mint is my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I kept thinking I would buy this local but never managed to find one that I liked and that was affordable in my opinion. I took a chance on this one and I was happily surprised with the quality of use pitcher, so far I have made cucumber mint, blueberry and strawberry infused water, so delicious and refreshing . Even my sister who was visiting was impressed with this pitcher and decided to order one for herself ,
customer_reviews.author: Fun Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I've had this less than 2 weeks and the middle fruit holder broke out of the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Pickle

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pitcher for infused water
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for a couple weeks now and happy with the purchase. The pitcher is sturdy but light - easy to clean and use. Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: heidi

customer_reviews.title: Delicious flavored water that is icey cold!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my new FAVORITE things!! So easy!! You choose your favorite fruit, herbs and veggies and stack them into the cylinder, fill with water and pop it in your fridge! In 2 hours you are drinking delicious, delicately flavored water!! You can also put crystals in this cylinder along with the fruit!! My favorite is Orange, Strawberry, Mint and cucumber!! Love it!! So happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Siri & Kamala

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Made Sangria in it and it worked really well. Looks pretty with all the different fruit I used. Also, just made lemon water and it works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Love My Pitcher!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this pitcher for about 6 months and just love it! I had been searching awhile for a covered pitcher that looks great and holds a decent amount of iced green tea, and am delighted with this purchase. The hot tea is steeped in a separate glass container, then added to the pitcher after the liquid has cooled a bit. Have not experienced any cracking or staining that others have mentioned. Other than the occasional washing, it has not left the refrigerator from the day it was received. Love opening the fridge and seeing this gorgeous pitcher with its graceful curves waiting there, beckoning our family to drink its healthy contents. =)
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few months ago wanting to add a little kick to my water and tea. I really love the idea and it works great! So far I've used frozen fruits such as berries and melons for my tea and water. As others have recommended I would wait 24 hours for the fruit to infuse into the liquid, then add more liquid after taking any out. I wasn't expecting my tea to taste much different because I like it pretty strong but I really did taste the strawberry! I really would recommend this pitcher! I gave it 4 stars because I have a little trouble with the lid sometimes, taking it off and making sure it's on right.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Spa Water
customer_reviews.text: My daughter calls this my “Spa Water.” Such a good purchase. I use daily with filtered water and keep it in my fridge. Not sure how I lived without it before.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Edgington

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: So love this pitcher. It feels substantial in your hands, not like other pitchers I have checked out in the stores that were super light weight and flimsy. This is beautiful. It is easy to assemble, disassemble and clean. Will be ordering another one so I have one for my berry infusion waters and one for my citrus, ginger and mint water. My family just LOVES the infused waters!
customer_reviews.author: Grammie B

customer_reviews.title: Fruit water is a nice change from plain water
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for a few days and it works like it should. I cut up some lemons and limes and within a few hours the water started to become infused with the citrus flavors. Some reviews mentioned the lid leaking. I have not had that issue. When you put the lid on it does seem like it's not on very well, but it hasn't come off or leaked. Overall, nice product.
customer_reviews.author: DuderMaguder

customer_reviews.title: Durable and FUN!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for myself and one for my daughter. It is wonderful! Love trying all sorts of stuff to make different flavors. I was having a problem getting my water intake daily, just to boring. Not with this!! Love the different flavors I can make and I love the easy cleanup of this item. And if you have non-water drinkers in your house then you need this. My 9 year old granddaughter will not drink water. But she has so much fun coming up with new flavors and drinks almost an entire pitcher a day. Her favorite is the watermelon/strawberry water we made.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Love it for all mixtures
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant pitcher and nice size Makes me want to Mae more lemonade. My only issue is the top does not rotate to close sprout.
customer_reviews.author: Francine Estevez

customer_reviews.title: Water tastes better
customer_reviews.text: We love this infuser. We put lemons in the tube and have it filled with water and the friends we have had over want one too!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Foos

customer_reviews.title: Fridge Essential
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I haven't had or seen one of these before!! This thing is simply amazing! If you are health conscious, you probably know about the health benefits of water. Day in and day out of drinking nothing but water can get pretty boring. In comes the fruit infusion pitcher to save the day! This thing gets tons of use at my place. My guests all love it. I always cut fresh fruit up & whatever I don't use, I toss it into the freezer or this pitcher. One particularly good fruit to use is coconut. I use thisto take the coconut meat out. Buy it & you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: M. Butterworth

customer_reviews.title: Natural Fruit infused Pitcher
customer_reviews.text: When I received this pitcher, I didn't realize thaI I would love the fruit infused part of it. It's great to have fruit unfused water with no added chemicals. I am buying a few more of these to give to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Donna sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Gift
customer_reviews.text: IAM giving this as a gift, for my aunt and she's always enjoyed her first one yet the handle is slightly cracked, but it was a different brand, and I am excited about this one for her
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Selby

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic pitcher. We love how convenient it is to clean, and the fruit we use doesn't get into the water. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Dallaire

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this picture!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pitcher! Bought it to give me healthier drink options and not be bored with water all the time. It's perfect! Pours great and large capacity is perfect! I follow the advice here, that said to add water as soon as you pour some out. I keep lemon water in mine. I'm considering ordering a second one to mix up flavors. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kat G

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use it all the time. The infuser part isn’t very wide, but I just take a spoon to pack the cucumber or mint in. You can do quarter cuts or rounds. The rounds just require the spoon method!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi D

customer_reviews.title: Buy this Pitcher!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pitcher! Very hard materials, no flimsy! I've made cleansing water in it a number of times and you get flavored water without all the floating stuff in your glass. It's also beautiful to look at. I used filtered water, pieces of cucumber, fresh peeled ginger, lemons, and mint. Very refreshing and colorful! I could see iced tea with lemons in the cartridge!
customer_reviews.author: Judi Ross

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher works great. I use it mostly for lemon and cucumber water and love being able to remove the infuser when the water becomes strong enough. I was hesitant about the plastic but it feels really sturdy. The lid doesn't screw on but it pops on there really well; I usually struggle to get it back off. Overall great quality pitcher!
customer_reviews.author: T Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Broke almost immediately but I can still use the pitcher
customer_reviews.author: judith sweren

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this purchase. I use it for fruit, mainly lemons for lemon water. Works great, great design and shape.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A

customer_reviews.title: Love this pitcher
customer_reviews.text: Love this pitcher! Looks great, is a good size and works just as it should. The biggest factor that I like is the length of the hollow rod where you put the fruit. It is long enough to stay sitting in the water until the very end. I had another pitcher where the rod stopped about 2 inches from the bottom of the pitcher. If you're infusing, that doesn't make alot of sense! I usually will refill after a couple glasses and the fruit continues to infuse. I am happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hostess gift @ $20
customer_reviews.text: This is the BOMB for my lemon-infused water and green tea. It looks pretty too. You can also try a variety of fruits, herbs (like mint), or cucumber--like the St. Regis spa has. This also makes the perfect hostess gift. It's thoughtful, healthy, and at a perfect price point. Everyone should order 4 of these to keep on hand for little gift occasions that come up.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy B.

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear
customer_reviews.text: Strong clear plastic, not to heavy, easy to work with, be careful cleaning it so you don’t scratch it ( only use soft sponge )
customer_reviews.author: STOPH4NYG

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very well built pitcher. Thick plastic and very durable. I have my first pitcher in the fridge now for morning. I am very happy with it. Well worth the money. Update...so I made my first pitcher last night with lemon lime and kiwi I love this!! Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Selma Bock

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid pitcher, great for lemon water!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice-looking for being plastic. It’s a solid plastic though, so it doesn’t look cheap or flimsy. Great for lemon water!
customer_reviews.author: DarcyD76

customer_reviews.title: Affordable & great
customer_reviews.text: Have as a gift. The one who received this gift loved it. Much more affordable than ones I found in store and Greta quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Fruge

customer_reviews.title: Not using it, just taking space on our countertop
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like it at all. That thing inside of it always move and is not easy to clean it, especially from lemons.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Terenti

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: This item was bought and given as a gift but it appeared to be of good quality and very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Adria

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble drinking enough water and this is really helping with that. Raspberry is yummy and chopped up lemon is as well. Not sorry
customer_reviews.author: KZ1961

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son and his family and they just love it. Lightweight and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Nanci L. Gonyea

customer_reviews.title: Broke with first use!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this infusion pitcher the one time that I got to use it. It broke while taking the infuser off in order to wash and refill it after the first use! The plastic ring where the infuser screws into the lid shattered (see picture).
customer_reviews.author: Melissa P

customer_reviews.title: It is as described
customer_reviews.text: This item is exactly as described. I purchased a second as a 🎁 gift for my mom, she loves it
customer_reviews.author: A. Muhammad

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my wife for xmas, she and my children love it. She has done strawberry, strawberry kewi and now doing strawberry lime. (see a pattern here?) I saw some reviews complaining the top doesn't age well. It is to new for that problem now, but I am glad I purchased it. It has brought great drinking enjoyment to my wife. Just an update. Use a little Vaseline on the infuser and don't twist too tight. We have some cracking, but it didn't break. It is sitting in our refrigerator, one of the most appreciated gifts I ever bought my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Emhodew

customer_reviews.title: I WAS DISAPPOINTED, BUT IT STILL HOLDS WATER
customer_reviews.text: I RECEIVED THIS ITEN AND THE LID WAS CRACKED AND A SMALL PIECE WAS BROKEN INSIDE. SINCE I AM IN AFGHANISTAN, IT WAS NOT WORTH THE TROUBLE TO SEND BACK . I WAS DISAPPOINTED, BUT IT STILL HOLDS WATER, SO I USE IT AS IT IS. I HAD HOPED FOR BETTER RESULTS THOUGH.
customer_reviews.author: ANXIOUS

customer_reviews.title: Add some summer flavor to your water
customer_reviews.text: I already use an individual infuser and wanted to get one that held more water. It looks like it's made of glass but it's high quality acrylic so it should last. I like the look of the pitcher and the feel of the handle. The infuser attaches easily and stays secure. Infused water is a nice change of pace from regular tap water with or without a lemon slice added. Peaches, strawberries and raspberries work well. Adding a bit of honey or stevia makes it tastes even better. I bought another one as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: deeveebee

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice. Fruit didnt really work right so just going to use water flavor drops
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job for the price. It does feel a bit cheap but it’s held up for several months with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Ok but the usability is not great
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher works and is ok (at best). 1) there is no cover for the spout - so you can't shake it and also the pitcher is open to the air because of that 2) difucult to fill because of the top I would look at other products. I have donated this already.
customer_reviews.author: Why?

customer_reviews.title: Sadly this broke after a couple of uses.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the idea but it broke after just a few uses. Spider cracks on the lid. Continued to use gently a few more times with the spider cracks, but after a couple of days little pieces of plastic began chipping off into the water. Must be very gentle using this product. I would not buy again. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tarra W.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't know this was plastic and wouldn't have bought it ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know this was plastic and wouldn't have bought it if I had known. Leaves a taste in your mouth. I have used it 3 times and the top is cracked. It is me and my husband in the household! Very disappointed and Amazon won't give us our money back!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love this picther!
customer_reviews.text: It's nice and sturdy flavors are there...Just wish the middle basket for the fruits were a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S

product_meta.title: Prodyne Fruit Infusion Flavor Pitcher, 2.9 qt clear, 93 oz
product_meta.description: Style Name:Fruit Flavor PitcherProdyne Fruit Infusion Flavor Pitcher
feature_bullets: Enjoy flavor-infused beverages made naturally at home with the Prodyne Fruit Infusion Pitcher
BPA-free acrylic pitcher has removable hollow rod that can be filled with fruits, citrus wedges, herbs, or savories
Open slots in rod allow contents to naturally combine with liquid; rod screws into lid, so it stays securely in place
Clear acrylic allows for enticing view; pitcher looks great on a well-set table; may be continually refilled without replacing fruit
Holds up to 93 ounces; requires hand washing for care

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,913 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
